item.description:
IMBIBE, SOCIALIZE, & BE HORRIFIED!

Join Fresh Tilled Soil, Grasshopper Group, & Janeiro Digital for a ghoulishly good time at the Drinks vs Zombies Halloween Party, in association with BREW Boston 2011.

Be welcomed & warned of our guests of honor: reincarnated Startup zombies, vampire VC's, ghostly Angel Investors, and any other brave souls haunted by enterprise. Join us for a ghoulishly good time, full of venturesome vibes, and BREW-ing visions of the unknown. Wear a costume or beware the consequences-- the creepier, the better.

@drinksvszombies #zombieBREW

Tickets are $5 each AND **100% of ticket proceeds go to Interise.org, a non profit charity supporting business development & entrepreneurship in inner city communities.**

Sign up for the event here

Bring your friends, family, and grandma for all we care-- the more the merrier, it's for a great cause.

Plus, there will be a Kettle One liquor louge & 100 complimentary cocktails worth of Vampire Blood & Zombie Ooze cocktails-- so get there early.

Click here to find out more about Fresh Tilled Soil & the event

See you there.. MUHAHAHA
item.name: BREW Halloween Bash for Entrepreneurs, Drinks vs Zombies
